WRITING.TITLE: Body Dysphoria
WRITING.TEXT: OMG my lower body dysphoria is off the records tonight! How do you guys get through it?

WRITING.TITLE: body dysphoria
WRITING.TEXT: how do you guys handle your bottom dysphoria? mine is really bad tonight and i can't seem to get around it. any tips?

WRITING.TITLE: welp that was interesting TW
WRITING.TEXT: I was just insulted by my mom. She thought it was funny. She called me a "shim" I almost cried. Like seriously? I don't get that from other people enough everyday? What would you do?

WRITING.TITLE: transgender
WRITING.TEXT: does starbucks still cover transgender affirming surgeries?
I was so caught up in the moment I couldn't even respond. I think she just thought it was funny and was being thoughtless.
I was really hurt and really shocked. I didn't know what to say.
That's awesome! Good for him and good luck to you all keep us posted!
It doesn't make you an asshole. You're just not attracted and that's cool. It's not like you're insulting people. You're cool.
You're so brave is one on soundcloud/youtube by chas ross
I tried being a girl for a day and thought I was going to die. I lasted 15 minutes. I was pretty certain then I was transgender. I'm more confident in myself

WRITING.TITLE: HRT and voice training
WRITING.TEXT: I am in a bit of a rut. I cannot go on testosterone due to some health issues so I'm wondering what I can do to make my voice sound more masculine? I've looked on youtube but am having a hard time finding voice training for guys. Any suggestions?
Thats great to hear though! I'm glad you found someone you like!

WRITING.TITLE: screwed up....again...
WRITING.TEXT: another clean streak down the drain. I feel like I'm never going to kick this no matter how hard I try.
